Item ID307

The fishing rod is an item used to catch fish through the Fishing skill. It can be bought from various fishing shops. To use a fishing rod, one will need fishing bait (except sandworms for anglerfish) to catch fish. It can be bought from fishing stores for 5 coins. There is also a fishing rod spawn in a house on south-eastern side of Entrana.

The equippable version of the fishing rod, the pearl fishing rod, can be bought with molch pearls from Alry the Angler.

The following fish are caught with a fishing rod:

Fish
Level 		Members?
Raw sardine 5 No
Raw herring 10 No
Raw pike 25 No
Raw slimy eel 28 Yes
Raw cave eel 38 Yes
Raw anglerfish 82 Yes
Sacred eel 87 Yes

7 July 2021
(update)

The fishing rod's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be held properly when fishing.
